item.title: Bash Basics
item.description: In this tutorial you will how to write bash scripts. I will take you step from Hello world to writing your own script that does some repetitive task for you. So, lets get started. Bash stands for Bourne Again shell. If you are using Linux or MAC OS you already have it install by default. You can check which version of bash you are using by bash -v let us create our first bash script that says Hello World.
